pages.text: The MekaSuit is a highly configurable late-game armor set. Like many other Mekanism tools/equipments, it uses power instead of having durability. Using a $(l:machines/modification_station)Modification Station$(/l), modules/units can be installed onto MekaSuit armor pieces.
Press $(k:key.mekanism.module_tweaker) to access the Module Tweaker GUI. Here you can configurate the modules installed on each MekaSuit armor piece.
